nexttext: where $\chi_{\mathrm{sin}}$ and $\chi_{\mathrm{bin}}$ are the usually defined $\surd\chi^2$ for each model fit, and $\nu_{\mathrm{sin}}$ and $\nu_{\mathrm{bin}}$ are the degrees of freedom for a single and binary model fit. The latter  were computed using the following expressions:
